NO_ALTING: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not use alts/multiple accounts to play or engage with Sofi. Self report if you have broken this rule to avoid punishment
NO_HELPING_ALTERS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not support or interact with alters and scammers. If you have suspicions about a user, please report them to staff
NO_EXPLOITING_BUGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Any and all bugs or exploits you find are to be reported immediately!
NO_BUY_SELL_ACCOUNTS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not engage in the process of buying or selling entire discord accounts
NO_FARMING: <:_:979009081325019156> You must not use your social media standing to gain any resources or cards on Sofi
NO_SCAMMING: <:_:979009081325019156> Trying to scam or trick another user will get you blacklisted from Sofi
DO_NOT_SCAMMED_ITEMS: <:_:979009081325019156> Items acquired through illegal activities will be removed from your inventory, regardless of how they were obtained
DO_NOT_SIBLINGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Siblings will be punished together if any one of them is found breaking rules
DO_NOT_CHANGE_EMAIL:
```fix
⚠️ Discord, as well as Sofi Staff will NEVER ask you for your password or advise you to change your E-Mail to a specific address. Beware of third-party discord BOTs that are often used for similar phishing attempts!
```
VISIT_SUPPORT: Visit our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/XPsQKJjeD7) for more information
